# Venue Booking Email Template

## Subject Line Options
1. `[BAND_NAME] - Booking Inquiry for [MONTH/DATE]`
2. `Metal Show Booking: [BAND_NAME] available [DATE_RANGE]`
3. `[BAND_NAME] - Looking to Bring the Metal to [VENUE_NAME]`

---

## Email Template: Initial Outreach

```
Subject: [BAND_NAME] - Booking Inquiry for [MONTH/YEAR]

Hey [VENUE_CONTACT_NAME],

Hope this email finds you well! 

I'm reaching out on behalf of [BAND_NAME], a [GENRE/STYLE] band from [LOCATION]. We're currently booking shows for [MONTH/YEAR] and would love to bring our live show to [VENUE_NAME].

[BAND_NAME] is [BRIEF_BAND_DESCRIPTION - 1-2 sentences about sound, vibe, and what makes the band unique].

We've been [RECENT_ACHIEVEMENT - e.g., "actively gigging in the region," "recently released our EP," "building a strong local following"], and we think our sound and energy would be a great fit for your venue.

Here's a bit about what we bring:
- [BAND_SIZE] piece band with professional live sound
- Draw of approximately [ESTIMATED_DRAW] people (can grow with promotion)
- Full backline [or specify what you bring/need]
- Professional attitude and easy to work with
- Active social media promotion for the show

We're flexible on dates and happy to work with your schedule. Our preferred dates are:
- [DATE_OPTION_1]
- [DATE_OPTION_2]
- [DATE_OPTION_3]

You can check us out here:
- Music: [STREAMING_LINK]
- Live video: [YOUTUBE_LINK]
- Instagram: [INSTAGRAM_HANDLE]

I've attached our tech rider for your reference. We're happy to discuss any questions or requirements you might have.

Looking forward to hearing from you and hopefully bringing some metal to [VENUE_NAME]!

Best regards,
Fabian Wohlgemuth
[BAND_NAME]
[PHONE_NUMBER]
[EMAIL]
[WEBSITE/SOCIAL_LINKS]
```

---

## Email Template: Follow-up (After 1-2 Weeks)

```
Subject: Re: [BAND_NAME] - Booking Inquiry Follow-up

Hey [VENUE_CONTACT_NAME],

Just wanted to follow up on my email from [DATE] about booking [BAND_NAME] at [VENUE_NAME].

We're still very interested in playing your venue and wanted to check if you've had a chance to consider the dates I mentioned. We're still available for:
- [DATE_OPTION_1]
- [DATE_OPTION_2]

If these dates don't work, we're happy to look at other options that fit your calendar better.

Let me know what you think!

Cheers,
Fabi
[CONTACT_INFO]
```

---

## Email Template: Show Confirmation

```
Subject: [BAND_NAME] - Show Confirmation for [DATE]

Hey [VENUE_CONTACT_NAME],

Awesome! Thanks for confirming the show on [DATE]. We're stoked to play [VENUE_NAME]!

Just to confirm the details:
- Date: [DATE]
- Load-in: [TIME]
- Soundcheck: [TIME]
- Doors: [TIME]
- Set time: [TIME]
- Set length: [DURATION]
- Payment: [AMOUNT/TERMS]

I've attached our updated tech rider. Please let me know if there are any issues with the requirements or if you need any additional information.

We'll start promoting immediately on our social channels. Please send over:
- Event page/poster if you have one
- Any specific hashtags or handles you want us to use
- Ticket link (if applicable)

Looking forward to it!

Best,
Fabi
[BAND_NAME]
[CONTACT_INFO]
```

---

## Email Template: Post-Show Thank You

```
Subject: Thanks for a Great Show!

Hey [VENUE_CONTACT_NAME],

Just wanted to reach out and say thanks for having us at [VENUE_NAME] on [DATE]. We had a blast and really appreciated [SPECIFIC_POSITIVE_DETAIL - e.g., "the great sound," "the awesome crowd," "your hospitality"].

We'd love to come back and play again sometime. Let us know when you're booking for [NEXT_PERIOD] - we'd be happy to return!

Also, if you need anything from us (photos, video, testimonial, etc.), just let me know.

Thanks again!

Cheers,
Fabi
[BAND_NAME]
[CONTACT_INFO]
```

---

## Customization Guide

### Before Sending, Fill In:
- [ ] `[BAND_NAME]`: Near's 2 Far or Combine Harvester
- [ ] `[VENUE_CONTACT_NAME]`: Venue booker's first name
- [ ] `[VENUE_NAME]`: Full venue name
- [ ] `[MONTH/YEAR]` or `[DATE]`: Specific dates
- [ ] `[GENRE/STYLE]`: Specific metal subgenre if relevant
- [ ] `[LOCATION]`: Your home base
- [ ] `[BRIEF_BAND_DESCRIPTION]`: 1-2 sentence pitch
- [ ] `[RECENT_ACHIEVEMENT]`: Latest accomplishment
- [ ] `[BAND_SIZE]`: Number of members
- [ ] `[ESTIMATED_DRAW]`: Conservative estimate
- [ ] `[STREAMING_LINK]`: Best track/album link
- [ ] `[YOUTUBE_LINK]`: Best live video
- [ ] `[CONTACT_INFO]`: Your contact details

### Tips for Success:
1. **Research the venue** - Mention specific shows or bands that played there
2. **Be professional but personable** - We're metal, not corporate
3. **Make it easy** - Provide links, dates, and tech rider upfront
4. **Follow up** - But don't be pushy; once is enough
5. **Build relationships** - Post-show thank you goes a long way
6. **Keep it concise** - Venue bookers are busy; get to the point

### Attachments:
- Tech Rider (see `/docs/templates/tech-rider.md`)
- EPK/Press Kit (if available)
- Professional band photo (if available)
